pullRequest.title: feat: add CLI parameter to define variables
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Add a new CLI parmeter --define | -d that allows users to pre-define variables when executing the CLI. This is useful when combining variables with the -e or -f.
Example:
$ ./bin/ksql -d env=qa -e 'show variables;'

 Variable Name | Value 
-----------------------
 env           | qa    
-----------------------

Users can define multiple variables using multiple --define | -d parameters:
$ ./bin/ksql -d env=qa -d streamName=s1 -e 'show variables;'

 Variable Name | Value 
-----------------------
 env           | qa    
 streamName    | s1    
-----------------------

Testing done
Added unit tests
Verified manually
